title: Name change for
body: For some reason my summoner name has been changed twice without my approval . Need help ?

replies.body:
Thaaaaat might be a sign that someone has hacked your account O_O!

Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap so that they can help repair and secure your account for you!
